title: Andrew Cuomo Accused of Sexual Harassment by 2nd Aide as Resignation Calls Mount
author: NBC New York
description:
NY Gov. Andrew Cuomo was already under fire for accusations of verbal harassment of lawmakers and mishandling of COVID deaths in nursing homes, before being rocked this week by allegations from two former aides of verbally and physically inappropriate behavior. Now some lawmakers are calling for the attorney general to investigate -- and even for Cuomo to resign. Anjali Hemphill reports.

https://www.nbcnewyork.com
